评论详情: This top is so soft, cozy, and trendy! The material is thick and warm, too! I love the quality and fit! It’s true to size and doesn’t shrink when washing! 10/10

Just right fit— size small for 5’ 110lbs — comfortable and still shows shape. Fabric is a medium to light texture and weight. Perfect for being cozy but not hot. Blue color is beautiful. A nice steely medium ocean blue.

评论概述: A thin cable neck sweater appropriate for the office or work environment.
评论详情: Very nice sweater for the price. I have enjoyed it so far. It laundered well It's thin, but not see through.

This sweater is great! I ordered, black, blue, and brown I think. I probably could have ordered a small. I am petite and I think a small would have been just fine. The selves are a bit long. But no complaints at all. Great quality!
Sweater is thin and not much shape.
Made well but not as soft as some claim. I ordered baby pink. Color was much darker. Size runs big. I would size down one.

评论概述: A stylish and cozy addition to your wardrobe!
评论详情: I recently ordered the LILLUSORY Women's Cable Knit V Neck Sweater in Dusty Blue, and I couldn't be happier with my decision! This sweater is incredibly soft and comfortable, perfect for all-day wear. The color is stunning, and the style is versatile enough to dress up for a night out or keep it casual for a day in. The flattering fit enhances my silhouette, and I've received many compliments whenever I wear it. Overall, I highly recommend this sweater to anyone looking for a stylish and cozy addition to their wardrobe!

This is a fabulous sweater. It is well made, no strings dangling or large gaps between the threads. The material is soft & medium weight material so it feels great against the skin & will keep you warm, but not make you sweat.  It has some stretch to it so it fits perfectly over bust and hips. It runs a tad big. I usually wear a large, but could have easily bought a medium. It is great for casual wear with jeans or can be worn with dressy slacks. Vneck allows you to wear a blouse under it or dress it up with a scarf. You wont be disappointed.

This Cable Knit sweater is a super cute, and comfortable piece that has been a great addition to my fall wardrobe. The material is breathable, and great for a warmer day. I really like the looser v-neck that you can wear a-symetrically as a off the shoulder piece.
This sweater was very thin, cheap material. I was hoping for a normal, thick cable knit sweater and this is not. The sizing is good though.

I really like this shade of blue and that the cable knit pattern is on back as well as the front. The knit is thin and a bit itchy, so I have to wear with an undershirt, which is not great. It pairs nicely with slacks to wear to work. Runs a bit large compared to the size chart. I’m a 14/16 and 38DD/40D, but I ordered a large, which fits perfectly.

评论概述: Beautiful color and shape, but too thin
评论详情: I purchased this sweater in nutmeg. It is beautiful, but way too thin. You definitely need to wear a camisole under it for warmth. It is also a bit on the short side regarding the length. If you have a short torso like myself, then it will fit you. For reference, I am 5'1.

This Lillusory Women's sweater is nice and soft. The stitching is what you would expect of a sweater in this price range and the color (Dusty Blue) is solid throughout the garment, with no dark or light spots. While the shape held up to washing, it did shrink despite being air dried. Had I known it would shrink as much as it did, I would have ordered a size up. It is still wearable, I just have to be more conscious of what shirt I wear under it. This sweater can be worn in a professional or casual work environment, and is great for an evening out, or just taking along in “just in case.”

评论概述: Pretty but not the knit I was expecting…
评论详情: The color is accurate, as is the shape. I was looking for a more natural knit/yarn; this is shiny polyester-like material. It would make it dressier- appropriate for work. Just not what I was looking for.

This is a great medium-weight sweater. It is well-made and fits true to size. The small cables add interest. The fabric is not scratchy and it washes well. This sweater can be paired with jeans for a casual look, or with slacks or a skirt for a more professional look.
Cute pullover, works for in-office days or date night if going more conservative!

This is a cute sweater but the material is very thin so you will definitely have to wear an undershirt with it. Also I ordered a small and it's still a bit baggy so I'm hoping it shrink a little in the wash.
This sweater is okay, but much thinner than it looked and I bought ivory, which is more of a very light tan color and it is not at all what I had expected. It's too brown-looking.
Beautiful sweater  has cable pattern in back as well as front. Lightweight enough to wear under a midi length cardigan as well as alone
Quality sweater. I will be buying a couple more in other colors.
This is perfect for an early fall or springtime outfit.  Lightweight enough for a cool day, or add layers for a more robust evening. It wears comfortably loose without feeling restricted.

This is a great lightweight v-neck sweater. I find the cable knit design very on trend and attractive. I sized up to a medium and found the sleeves a little long. This is easily remedied since I can cuff them. This is the perfect sweater for layering over a tank top or blouse. Very comfortable and the dusty blue is a nice shade. The sweater washes easily and hangs to dry. This is a great piece to have in your wardrobe. Definitely a classic.
It’s scratchy and see through. Not very soft

This Sweater is so beautiful! I love the color and the fit. It is comfortable to wear, and it looks great with jeans for a casual outfit and working pants as well. Overall, very pleased with this sweater.

This sweater is sooo cute and I love the color. It fits slightly oversized but not too much. The quality is pretty good but could maybe be a tiny bit softer. Overall, really happy with it and would recommend.

Why is it so hard to find a sweater like this nowadays? I'm so happy I found this one, tried it on, and it looks cute, classy, and comfy! It's not too short, too close or too far from my neck, the sleeves are the right length, the knit design is classic and beautiful, and the color is also so pretty. The fit is also nice, and comfortable. I'm very happy with this sweater! It's definitely my new go-to!

The LILLUSORY Women's Cable Knit V Neck Sweater is pretty nice. The quality is good and the material soft. It fits slightly loose and I am used to wearing more slim-fit styles, but this looks good at work and is a good weight for a slightly cool office. It is easy to layer with a tighter undershirt as well.  For reference, I am 5'4" (borderline petite), wear a size 10/12 usually, or size Medium US size, weigh 175-lbs give or take a few, have a 36C chest and size 32-34" waist. I got the size large in Dusty Blue (large is what I generally wear in European-made clothing.)  I am happy with the sweater and the color is perfect!

Picked this up for my wife who has found the sweater to be comfy and it fits well.  Quality is lacking...the v neck seam has one side of the seam slightly higher than the other which unfortunately is quite noticeable when worn.  She is 5'6"...120 lbs and the small fit perfectly however probably would recommend to pass on this from a quality aspect.

评论概述: Classic look, on the thin side
评论详情: This LILLUSORY Women's Cable Knit V Neck Sweater looks nice. The color is great and it appears to be decently made. It's a classic cable knit look with a v neck which I love. The downside is that the fabric is rather thin and it's nit the softest of materials.
There is a difference between a lightweight sweater and a sweater that is just too thin. I was disappointed by how thin and cheap feeling this sweater is. The sweater is a really pretty color.

I love the color and quality of this sweater. Perfect for the upcoming cooler months. The cable knit design is exactly what i was looking for. Looks classic and clean and is not too heavy or light. Perfect medium weight and goes with everything. Good quality, would recommend

Love this cable knit sweater style.  Classic and timeless (though it also takes me back).  I got the size small (normal size for tighter fit), and it fits great!  Got the cream color, and I love it!  It's a nice, lightweight sweater that will go really well with most clothing.  Very happy with this purchase!

This sweater was a nice surprise in that the quality is good, the sizing is consistent, the fabric is of good quality, and the color is very pretty. I sometimes have difficulty with sweaters being the right arm length, but this one was perfect. The sleeves are easy to push up the arm if I choose but they don't lose their elasticity. It is a lightweight sweater as advertised, but with a scarf and jacket it will easily work well throughout the fall and winter and into the spring.

The LILLUSORY V-neck sweater is a stylish and comfortable wardrobe essential. Made from soft and breathable fabric, it provides all-day comfort while its stretchy material ensures a flattering fit for most body types. The chic cable knit design, long sleeves, and ribbed cuffs give it a cozy yet polished look. Versatile and timeless, this lightweight pullover can be dressed up with tailored pants for a professional vibe or paired with jeans for a casual, laid-back outfit. A perfect combination of style and functionality, it’s a go-to piece for any season.

My hieght is in my limbs, and I have a short waist. I generally never have a problem with shirts being too short but have an issue with sleeves being too short. I rodered a size medium in the nutmeg colour.  The colour isn't bad. The sizing is on par with other mediums. The sleeves are, thankfully, long enough. However, I was really surpised by how short the sweater is. If I lift my arms, the sweater is up over my belly button. There is no way someone with a longer torso could wear this and have it not be a cropped sweater. This would all be fine, except for the wide banding at the bottom. The banding comes up too high to tuck it under, and it makes the bottom of the sweater drape weirdly, whereas it would otherwise drape nicely. That banding makes the entire sweater end up looking frumpy and unflattering. Had I tried this on in person, I would not have ended up purchasing it.

评论概述: Perfect Lightweight Cable Knit Sweater for Early Spring and Fall
评论详情: When I think of cable knit sweaters, I picture them as thick and bulky which tends to overwhelm petite women. To my utter surprise, this one from Lillusory is lightweight. I can see it taking me from early fall to spring. Because it’s lightweight, this would look great underneath a cream blazer. The look is timeless and sophisticated. I am in love with the color, the yummy shade of nutmeg. Cable knit sweaters tend to loose shape, especially around the hems from repeated washing so I’ll be curious how this one holds its shape. If your style leans toward classic and unfussy, this sweater would make a great addition to your tasteful collection.

This LILLUSORY Women's Cable Knit V Neck Sweater is very nice. It seems well made and fits as expected. I got the cream color and it may be a little thin so you will probably see the outline of your bra. However, it still looks very nice on. This would also make a good gift.

I love this figure-flattering sweater!  The v-neck, the cable pattern, the cotton/acrylic yarn, the weight—-everything!  So comfortable, and can be dressed up or down.  This will be worn often.  Excellent value.  (As with all garments, be sure to follow laundering instructions.)

LILLUSORY Women's Cable Knit V Neck sweater arrived very quickly and in excellent condition. Right out of the bag it is wrinkle-free and ready to wear.  The sweater is 55% acrylic and 45% cotton,  it’s lightweight, comfortable, flatters, and is  beautiful color of blue. Downside is it’s dry clean or hand wash recommended. They said hand washing is to maintain apparel's vibrant color. Cotton/acrylic blend minimizes shrinkage and is color than our cotton.  This sweater would make a nice gift and can be shipped and still be presentable.
